arabicText: قُلْ إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ رَبِّىَ ٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ وَٱلْإِثْمَ وَٱلْبَغْىَ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ وَأَن تُشْرِكُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا وَأَن تَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “My	 Lord	 has	 forbidden	 the	
indecencies,	 the	 apparent	 among	 them	
and	 the	 hidden,	 and	 sin	 and	 wrongful	
excesses,	 and	 forbidden	 that	 you	 ascribe	
partners	with	Allah for	which	He	has	not	
sent	 down	 any	 proof,	 and	 forbidden	 that	
you	say	 things	concerning	Allah of	which	
you	do	not	have	knowledge.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmao	mere	Rab	ne	 to	be-hayaiyān	
harām	farmayi	haiñ	jo	un	meiñ	khuli	haiñ	
aur	 jo	 chhupi	 aur	 gunah	 aur	 na-haq	
ziyadati	aur	yeh	ke	Allah	ka	shareek	karo	
jiski	usne	sanad	na	utāri	aur	yeh	ke	Allah	
par	woh	bāt	kaho	jiska	Ilm	nahi	rakhte

arabicText: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌۭ ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ لَا يَسْتَأْخِرُونَ سَاعَةًۭ ۖ وَلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	every	group	has	a	promise;	so	when	
its	promise	comes,	it	cannot	be	postponed	
for	a	moment	or	brought	forward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	har	giroh	ka	ek	w’āda	hai	to	jab	unka	
w’āda	 āayega	 ek	ghadi	 na	 peechhe	 ho	 na	
āage

arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ إِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى ۙ فَمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ وَأَصْلَحَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Descendants	 of	 Adam!	 If	 Noble	
Messengers	from	among	you	come	to	you	
narrating	My	verses	- so	whoever	practices	
piety	and	reforms	- upon	him	shall	be	no	
fear	nor	shall	he	grieve.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Ādam ki	aulād" Agar	tumhāre	pās	tum	
meiñ	ke	Rasool	āayeiñ	meri	āyateiñ	padhte	
to	 jo	 parhez-gāri	 kare	 aur	 sañware	 to	 us	
par	na	kuchh	khauf	aur	na	kuchh	gham

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ عَنْهَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	denied	Our	signs	and	were	
conceited	towards	them,	are	the	people	of	hell-fire;	they	will	remain	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	hamāri	āyateiñ	jhutlayiñ	aur	unke	muqābil	takabbur	kiya	woh	dozakhi	haiñ	unheiñ	
us	meiñ	hamesha	rehna.

arabicText: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَنَالُهُمْ نَصِيبُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا يَتَوَفَّوْنَهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ ضَلُّوا۟ عَنَّا وَشَهِدُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	who	is	more	unjust	 than	one	who	 fabricated	a	lie	against	Allah or	denied	His	signs?	Their	
written	fate	will	reach	them;	until	when	Our	sent	angels	come	to	remove	their	souls,	hence	they	
say	to	them,	“Where	are	they	whom	you	used	to	worship	besides	Allah?”	They	say,	“We	have	lost	
them”	and	they	testify	against	themselves	that	they	were	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	us	se	badh	kar	Ƶālim	kaun	jis	ne	Allah	par	jhoot	bāñdha	ya	uski	āyateiñ	jhutlayiñ	unheiñ	unke	
naseeb	 ka	likha	 pahuñchega	 yahāñ	 tak	 ke	jab	 unke	 pās	 hamāre	 bheje	 huwe	 unki	jān	 nikālne	
āayeiñ	to	unse	kehte	haiñ	kahāñ	haiñ	woh	jin	ko	tum	Allah	ke	siwa	poojte	they	kehte	haiñ	woh	
hum	se	gum	gaye	aur	apni	jānoñ	par	āap	gawāhi	dete	haiñ	ke	woh	kāfir	they.

arabicText: قَالَ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ فِىٓ أُمَمٍۢ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ فِى ٱلنَّارِ ۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتْ أُمَّةٌۭ لَّعَنَتْ أُخْتَهَا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱدَّارَكُوا۟ فِيهَا جَمِيعًۭا قَالَتْ أُخْرَىٰهُمْ لِأُولَىٰهُمْ رَبَّنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَـَٔاتِهِمْ عَذَابًۭا ضِعْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ قَالَ لِكُلٍّۢ ضِعْفٌۭ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah says	to	them,	“Join	the	groups	of	jinns
and	mankind	who	have	entered	hell	before	
you”;	 when	 a	 group	 enters,	 it	 curses	 the	
other;	until	when	they	have	all	gone	in,	the	
latter	 groups	 will	 say	 regarding	 the	
former,	 “Our	 Lord!	 It	is	 these	who	led	 us	
astray,	 so	 give	 them	 double	 the	
punishment	of	 the fire”;	He	will	say,	 “For	
each	one	is	double	- but	you	do	not	know.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	un	se	farmāta	hai	ke	tum	se	pehle	jo	
aur	jamāteiñ	jin	aur	ādmiyoñ	ki	āag	meiñ	
gayiñ	 unhiñ	meiñ	 jāo	 jab	 ek	 giroh	 dākhil	
hota	hai	doosre	par	l’anat	karta	hai	yahān	
tak	ke	jab	sab	us	meiñ	ja	pade	 to	pichhle	
pehloñ	 ko	 kaheñge	 aey Rab	 hamāre"
Unhoñ	ne	hum ko	behkaya	 tha	 to	unheiñ	
āag	ka	doona	(Dugna)	‘aƶāb		de	farmayega	
sab	ko	doona	hai	magar	 tumheiñ		khabar	
nahi.

arabicText: وَقَالَتْ أُولَىٰهُمْ لِأُخْرَىٰهُمْ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمْ عَلَيْنَا مِن فَضْلٍۢ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 preceding	groups	will	 say	 to	 the	
latter,	“So	you	too	were	no	better	than	us,	
therefore	 taste	 the	 punishment	 for	 what	
you	have	done!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 pehle	 pichhloñ	 se	 kaheñge	 to	 tum	
kuchh	hum	se	achchhe	na	rahe	to	chakho	
‘aƶāb		badla	apne	kiye	ka.
